note.p: South African surgeon. Surgeon at Katberg Convict Station, Cape Colony.

person.note:
British 1820 settlers to South Africa, 1820settlers.com/genealogy/index.php (accessed 9 September 2019)
Cape of Good Hope general directory.
Census returns of England and Wales 1841 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/336/1/39/7), 1851 (HO107/1772/76/5)>
Grahamstown Journal, 9 June 1865 (eggsa.org/newspapers/index.php/grahamstown-journal/1205-grahamstown-journal-1865-2-april-to-june, accessed 9 September 2019) This explicitly states he was surgeon at Katberg.
South Africa, Cape Province, probate records of the Master of the High Court, 1834–1989 s.v. McCarthy, Victoria Frederica (Familysearch.org, accessed 9 September 2019)
